import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Edit = () => { const { id } =useParams(); const [equipment,setEquipment]=useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/equipment/${id}`) .then(resp=>setEquipment(resp.data)) .catch(err=>console.log(err)); },[id]) console.log(equipment) return (






Update Equipment View Equipments
) } export default Edit
